attributes.action: ScrapDriver Professional Competence periodic training for HGV Drivers
attributes.additional_details: it cost enough as it is to work as a HGV Driver this is just a waste of time courses just explains what we all ready no and use on a daily basis nothing but a money making racket!
attributes.background: There is no need for Driver Certificate of Professional Competence ( CPC ) periodic training as we are now out of the EU as we where about only country enforcing it.
